"【姉想いの弟】<br>仮テキスト": "<%me> and Quna, can you hear me?"
"It seems that just as planned the dragon is in the sphere arena."
"I don't know how long he'll remain there."
"It's okay, it's not likely that he'll move as long as there's music."
"That and one more thing, there's something that I wanted to inform the two of you of."
"It seems that other dragons have started going berserk. Apparently the reason for it may have something to do with Hadred."
"That's okay. You do not need to explain Casra of the council of Six."
"That is to say, I know the reason. I've heard it before."
"The destruction of the research facility, Hadred going berserk, and the inhumane experiments..."
"In order to protect me, he put down his life."
"I see, then I look forward to a harsh battle."
"Let's go. Hadred is waiting for us."
